cloneNoCampaignSelectedFromGrid.en: Select a campaign to clone from Adwords to Bing Ads.

cloneSyncNoCampaignSelectedFromGrid.en: Select a campaign to clone-sync from Adwords to Bing Ads.

cloneNoCampaignSelectedFromGridToYP.en: Select a campaign to clone from Adwords to ypSearch Marketplace.
cloneNoCampaignSelectedFromGridToYP.ja: Select a campaign to clone from Adwords to ypSearch Marketplace.

cloneSyncNoCampaignSelectedFromGridToYP.en: Select a campaign to clone-sync from Adwords to ypSearch Marketplace.
cloneSyncNoCampaignSelectedFromGridToYP.ja: Select a campaign to clone-sync from Adwords to ypSearch Marketplace.

cloneNoCampaignAdwordsToYP.en: Clone from Adwords to ypSearch Marketplace.
cloneNoCampaignAdwordsToYP.ja: Clone from Adwords to ypSearch Marketplace.

cloneSyncNoCampaignAdwordsToYP.en: Clone-sync from Adwords to ypSearch Marketplace.
cloneSyncNoCampaignAdwordsToYP.ja: Clone-sync from Adwords to ypSearch Marketplace.

cloneNoCampaignAdwordsToBing.en: Clone from Adwords to Bing Ads.
cloneNoCampaignAdwordsToBing.ja: Clone from Adwords to Bing Ads.

cloneSyncNoCampaignAdwordsToBing.en: Clone-sync from Adwords to Bing Ads.
cloneSyncNoCampaignAdwordsToBing.ja: Clone-sync from Adwords to Bing Ads.

cloneNoCampaignSelected.en: At least one campaign must be selected to launch the clone-sync process.
cloneNoCampaignSelected.ja: クローン同期の実行には、1つ以上のキャンペーンを選択してください。

cloneMaxReached.en: Can't clone more than {max} Campaigns using clone button
cloneMaxReached.ja: クローンボタンを使用してクローンを作成可能なキャンペーン数を超えています。最大数：{max}

cloneSyncMaxReached.en: Can't clone-sync more than {max} Campaigns using clone-sync button
cloneSyncMaxReached.ja: クローン同期ボタンを使用してクローン同期可能なキャンペーン数を超えています。最大数：{max}

cloneNoBingAccountLinked.en: No Bing Ads Account currently linked. At least one must be linked to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning to Bing Ads

cloneNoYPAccountLinked.en: No ypSearch Marketplace Account currently linked. At least one must be linked to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning to ypSearch Marketplace
cloneNoYPAccountLinked.ja: No ypSearch Marketplace Account currently linked. At least one must be linked to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning to ypSearch Marketplace

cloneSyncNoBingAccountLinked.en: No Bing Ads Account currently linked. At least one must be linked to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning-Syncing to Bing Ads

cloneNoBingAccountSelected.en: Please, select a Bing Ads Publisher Account to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning to Bing Ads.

cloneNoYPAccountSelected.en: Please, select a ypSearch Marketplace Publisher Account to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning to ypSearch Marketplace.
cloneNoYPAccountSelected.ja: Please, select a ypSearch Marketplace Publisher Account to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning to ypSearch Marketplace.

cloneSyncNoBingAccountSelected.en: Please, select a Bing Ads Publisher Account to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning-Syncing to Bing Ads.

cloneNoCampaignNoPriorSyncing.en: No syncing with AdWords site will be executed prior to activating the process.
cloneNoCampaignNoPriorSyncing.ja: アクティブ化前は、AdWordsサイトの同期は行われません。

cloneSyncNoCampaignNoPriorSyncing.en: No updates from AdWords publisher will be executed prior to activating the Clone-Sync process.
cloneSyncNoCampaignNoPriorSyncing.ja: クローン同期のアクティブ化前は、AdWordsパブリッシャーへの更新は行われません。

clonerBingAccountSelectTooltip.en: Choose a Bing Ads account where you want to clone your AdWords campaigns.

clonerImportChangesToExistingBingAdsCamp.en: Import changes to existing Bing Ads campaigns

clonerYPAccountSelectTooltip.en: Choose a ypSearch Marketplace account where you want to clone your AdWords campaigns.
clonerYPAccountSelectTooltip.ja: Choose a ypSearch Marketplace account where you want to clone your AdWords campaigns.

clonerClonedEntitiesTooltip.en: Find out what entities are supported by the Cloner. Only these entities will be imported to your selected account.
clonerClonedEntitiesTooltip.ja: クローナーでサポートされているエンティティを確認してください。サポート対象のエンティティのみが選択されたアカウントにインポートされます。

clonerSyncExclusionsTooltip.en: If you made changes in AdWords, we'll sync those changes with associated Bing Ads campaigns except for items unchecked below.

clonerYPSyncExclusionsTooltip.en: If you made changes in AdWords, we'll sync those changes with associated ypSearch Marketplace campaigns except for items unchecked below.
clonerYPSyncExclusionsTooltip.ja: If you made changes in AdWords, we'll sync those changes with associated ypSearch Marketplace campaigns except for items unchecked below.

clonerSyncDeleteEntitiesTooltip.en: Select this check box if you want to keep any manual changes applied in your Bing Ads campaigns. For example, you have manually added location extensions in your Bing Ads campaigns. To keep them, you will select the "do not delete entities manually created in Bing Ads campaigns".

clonerYPSyncDeleteEntitiesTooltip.en: Select this check box if you want to keep any manual changes applied in your ypSearch Marketplace campaigns. For example, you have manually added location extensions in your ypSearch Marketplace campaigns. To keep them, you will select the "do not delete entities manually created in ypSearch Marketplace campaigns".
clonerYPSyncDeleteEntitiesTooltip.ja: Select this check box if you want to keep any manual changes applied in your ypSearch Marketplace campaigns. For example, you have manually added location extensions in your ypSearch Marketplace campaigns. To keep them, you will select the "do not delete entities manually created in ypSearch Marketplace campaigns".

clonerBidAndBudgetTooltip.en: Enter your bid and budget adjustments for your Bing Ads campaigns. Please note that bids adjustments do not apply on device targets.  The system will display your previous values for bids and budget entered on the last cloning process with this publisher account.

clonerYPBidAndBudgetTooltip.en: Enter your bid and budget adjustments for your ypSearch Marketplace campaigns. Please note that bids adjustments do not apply on device targets.  The system will display your previous values for bids and budget entered on the last cloning process with this publisher account.
clonerYPBidAndBudgetTooltip.ja: Enter your bid and budget adjustments for your ypSearch Marketplace campaigns. Please note that bids adjustments do not apply on device targets.  The system will display your previous values for bids and budget entered on the last cloning process with this publisher account.

cloneSelectAll.en: The clone function is not available when using the Select All checkbox.
cloneSelectAll.ja: 全てのチェックボックスを選択している場合、クローン機能は使用できません。

cloneSyncSelectAll.en: The clone-sync function is not available when using the Select All checkbox.
cloneSyncSelectAll.ja: 全てのチェックボックスを選択している場合、クローン同期機能は使用できません。

cloneNoCampaignSelectedFromGridToYahoo.en: Select a campaign to clone from Adwords to Yahoo Gemini.

cloneSyncNoCampaignSelectedFromGridToYah.en: Select a campaign to clone-sync from Adwords to Yahoo Gemini.

cloneNoCampaignAdwordsToYahoo.en: Clone from Adwords to Yahoo Gemini.

cloneSyncNoCampaignAdwordsToYahoo.en: Clone-sync from Adwords to Yahoo Gemini.

cloneNoYahooAccountLinked.en: No Yahoo Gemini Account currently linked. At least one must be linked to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning to Yahoo Gemini

cloneNoYahooAccountSelected.en: Please, select a Yahoo Gemini Publisher Account to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning to Yahoo Gemini.

clonerYahooAccountSelectTooltip.en: Choose a Yahoo Gemini account where you want to clone your AdWords campaigns.

clonerYahooSyncExclusionsTooltip.en: If you made changes in AdWords, we'll sync those changes with associated Yahoo Gemini campaigns except for items unchecked below.

clonerYahooSyncDeleteEntitiesTooltip.en: Select this check box if you want to keep any manual changes applied in your Yahoo Gemini campaigns. For example, you have manually added location extensions in your Yahoo Gemini campaigns. To keep them, you will select the "do not delete entities manually created in Yahoo Gemini campaigns".

clonerYahooBidAndBudgetTooltip.en: Enter your bid and budget adjustments for your Yahoo Gemini campaigns. Please note that bids adjustments do not apply on device targets.  The system will display your previous values for bids and budget entered on the last cloning process with this publisher account.

cloneSyncNoYahooAccountLinked.en: No Yahoo Gemini Account currently linked. At least one must be linked to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning to Yahoo Gemini

cloneSyncNoYPAccountSelected.en: Please, select a ypSearch Marketplace Publisher Account to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning-Syncing to ypSearch Marketplace.
cloneSyncNoYPAccountSelected.ja: Please, select a ypSearch Marketplace Publisher Account to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning-Syncing to ypSearch Marketplace.

syncChangesToExistingClonedCampaigns.en: Sync your changes to existing cloned campaigns

cloneSyncNoYPAccountLinked.en: No ypSearch Marketplace Account currently linked. At least one must be linked to allow AdWords Campaigns Cloning-Syncing to ypSearch Marketplace

cloneSyncCampAdwToBing.en: Clone and Sync campaigns from AdWords to Bing Ads

msg_currentlyCloningAdWordsToBing.en: Currently cloning AdWords campaigns to Bing Ads.

msg_currentlyCloningSyncingAdWordsToBing.en: Currently cloning or syncing AdWords campaigns to Bing Ads.

msg_currentlyCloningAdWordsToYahooGemini.en: Currently cloning AdWords campaigns to Yahoo Gemini.

msg_currentlyСloningSyncingAdWordsToYaho.en: Currently cloning or syncing AdWords campaigns to Yahoo Gemini.

msg_notifiedByEmail.en: You will be notified by email when the process is complete

msg_currentlyCloningSyncingAdWordsToYpSe.en: Currently cloning or syncing AdWords campaigns to ypSearch Marketplace.

msg_campaignsAreBeingClonedOrSynced.en: Campaigns are being cloned or synced

cloneCampaignsFromAdWordsToBingAds.en: Clone campaigns from AdWords to Bing Ads

cloneCampaignsFromAdWordsToYpSearchMarke.en: Clone campaigns from AdWords to ypSearch Marketplace

cloneAndSyncCampaignsFromAdWordsToYpSear.en: Clone and Sync campaigns from AdWords to ypSearch Marketplace

cloneAndSyncCampaignsFromAdWordsToYahooG.en: Clone and Sync campaigns from AdWords to Yahoo Gemini

cloneCampaignsFromAdWordsToYahooGemini.en: Clone campaigns from AdWords to Yahoo Gemini
